tool_description: The Helpdesk KPI  is an API designed to help you manage your customer support operations. This API provides comprehensive Key Performance Indicators (KPIs) that offer deep insights into the efficiency, effectiveness, and customer satisfaction levels of your helpdesk/customer support.
name: Helpdesk KPI
title: Helpdesk KPI

api_list.name: Send tickets data
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://helpdesk-kpi.p.rapidapi.com/kpi/helpdesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helpdesk-kpi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://helpdesk-kpi.p.rapidapi.com/kpi/helpdesk"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "helpdesk-kpi.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
